EMAIL cxyamalia@gmail.com 

 

RESEARCH INTERESTS

Digital Humanities, Museums, Visitor Studies, Text Analysis, Social Networking Analysis

 

EDUCATION

B.A. in Art management, Central Academy of Fine Arts, Beijing, China 

2017 - Present

Summer school  Introduction to Digital Humanities Online Workshop at Oxford Summer School

11-15 July 2022

Certifacate of Text Analysis with Python offered by UCx, an online learning initiative of University of Canterbury

29 July 2022

 

EXHIBITION CURATION EXPERIENCE

Curator of Shadow of Narkissos – video art exhibition (both offline and online exhibition)  June 2021

Curator of Born in Purple – Tyrian purple BioArt project   December 2021

 

RESEARCH EXPERIENCE AND PUBLICATION

Student Researcher with Dr. Huiling Feng.  March 2022 - Present

Research Center for Digital Humanities of RUC, Beijing, China (http://dh.ruc.edu.cn/)

researching and combining digital exhibitions and virtual museums with digital humanities.

Bachelor Student with Dr. Xue Feng. 2020 - Present

Virtual Lab for Art Museum of Central Academy of Fine Arts (https://vlam.cafa.edu.cn/about.html)

designing art exhibitions on VLAM and discussing how to improve digital performance.

Designer of METAMUSE – a virtual museum built in ROBLOX  May 2021

combined virtual exhibitions with gamification to achieve the purpose of art education.

Co-author of Palace of Art: 100 Most Influential Artists - From Renaissance to Postmodern     January 2020

Beijing Arts and Crafts Publishing House, Beijing (ISBN:9787514017298)

 

INTERNSHIP AND VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE

Panorama Photographer in Arbor Standard, Shenzhen, China. 

2019 - 2020

skilled in shooting with panoramic equipment and post-production of the digitalization of art exhibitions.

Museum Volunteer in Whangarei Art Museum, Whangarei, New Zealand 

October 2020

organized museum documents, assisted curators in planning exhibitions and prepared for opening ceremony.

Social Volunteer in Beijing Ren Ai Charity Foundation, Beijing, China  February 2018 - October 2018

woke up at 5 am to provide free porridge for janitors and office workers who are too busy to have breakfast.

 

AWARDS AND HONORS

National Encouragement Scholarship May 2018

The Third Prize Scholarship of Central Academy of Fine Arts  August 2019

The First Prize in Photography Competition of the Most Beautiful Scenes of China September 2020

The Second Prize of Excellent Project of Central Academy of Fine Arts March 2022
